DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether supplemental perioperative oxygen significantly decrease incidence post-Cesarean endometritis wound infection among woman undergo Cesarean section onset labor .
DOC.brief_title: Supplemental Perioperative Oxygen Reduce Incidence Post-Cesarean Endometritis Wound Infection
